subject: Re: Order #SSN1549 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Sorrentino,  Our warehouse has already handed the shipment over to the logistics company, so the order cannot be canceled.
Disregard Anthony Sorrentino Sent from my iPhone

I can’t access the help desk and when I try to select forgot my password it says I’m not authorized I had this on order but it was stuck in limbo with a label created and no activity for a while and after selecting expedited shipping for a premium I’m being given ground shipping So I wanted to cancel and source from elsewhere. However I then mentioned to disregard the cancellation So now I’m not sure what is going on just want to know when I’m going to receive my pedals… Anthony Sorrentino Sent from my iPhone
Hi Anthony Sorrentino,     According to 17track, the package is marked as "delivered." Please kindly check and confirm.
